actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 to provide a 20-percent increase in annuities, with further increases based on rises in the cost of living.

summary.text: Authorizes under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937, a 20 percent increase in annuities with further periodic increases based on rises in the cost of living.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 to provide a 20-percent increase in annuities, with further increases based on rises in the cost of living.
